Privacy Policy

Effective Date: April 14, 2025
App Name: Bhavyatra
Developer: Shruti Jain

Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how Bhavyatra collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our app.

1. Information We Collect
We do not collect any personal information unless you explicitly provide it. However, to improve your experience, we may collect:
- Device Information
- Feedback
- Location (if permission granted)

2. How We Use Your Information
- To provide and improve the app experience
- To personalize features
- To respond to feedback

3. Data Sharing
We do not share your personal data unless:
- Required by law
- Needed to protect our users

4. Security
We use reasonable measures to protect your data, but no system is 100% secure.

5. Your Consent
By using the app, you consent to this Privacy Policy.

6. Changes to This Policy
We may update this policy. Changes will be reflected in the app.

7. Contact Us
